title: SGC graded t205 Bender, Walsh and Karger For Sale
author: Mrc32

posts.post_title: SGC graded t205 Bender, Walsh and Karger For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have three SGC graded t205s for sale

Bender- $150 ([URL="http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&item=370205996816"]recent ebay sale of an SGC 20 for $92[/URL])
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/mrc32/cardsforsale/websize/bendersalesgc.jpg[/IMG]

Walsh- $155 (Recent [URL="http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&item=110388749566"]ebay sale of an SGC 40 for $215[/URL])
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/mrc32/cardsforsale/websize/walshd.jpg[/IMG]

Karger- $140 (recent ebay sales of [URL="http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&item=380128428423"]and SGC 40 $130[/URL] and a [URL="http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&item=150343203897"]PSA 3 for $147[/URL]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/mrc32/cardsforsale/websize/kargersalesgc.jpg[/IMG]

PM me or email me.  Shipping is on me, but add 3% for paypal fees if you prefer that payment method.
